title: Black Kiss-tory
description: Too often, Black history is portrayed as a story of struggle and suffering, completely devoid of joy. So we called up some romance novelists whose work focuses on Black history. They told us that no matter how hard the times, there has always been room for love.

itunes:title: Black Kiss-tory
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: This week, we called up some romance novelists whose work focuses on Black history—just in time for Black History Month and Valentine's Day.
itunes:subtitle: This week, we called up some romance novelists whose work focuses on Black history—just in time for Black History Month and Valentine's Day.
content:encoded: Too often, Black history is portrayed as a story of struggle and suffering, completely devoid of joy. So we called up some romance novelists whose work focuses on Black history. They told us that no matter how hard the times, there has always been room for love.
